step.cmd:
Select
File Import Design Studio - Import Enquiries.
step.stepresult: T24 application import wizard is open.

step.cmd: Select the T24 server from the list and click Next.
step.stepresult: DS connects to the T24 server and retrieves all existing Enquiries.

step.cmd: Select the enquiry(ies) you want to import. For a global selection, click on the Select All button. You can filter the selection by Application, module and component name.
Click on Next and select the location where you want the Enquiries to be imported.

taskbody.result: The selected files are imported in the chosen location. Importing large number of Enquiries may take a long time.
